about_the_game:
EvolveLabOnline is a roguelite autobattler, where each enemy you encounter was created by another player. You are a scientist trying to explore the depths of an unknown aquatic planet. As you descent, on each depth you will fight against enemies created by other players and if you win you can evolve the behaviour of your creature until you are the first player to reach a new record depth.

Whenever a creature loses, it stays at the current depth and becomes a possible encounter for following players. Over time the waters of this planet will be filled with all kinds of different creatures and it will get harder and harder to be the first player to reach a new depth.

To program a creature, players can add different actions to their state machine or improve and modify these actions.

The Game currently features:


  • 4 unique creatures to pick from
  • 27 different actions that can be used by a creature
  • 24 different modules and modifiers to further modify actions
  • 23 different cores that provide the creature with unique special abilities
  • Millions of possible combinations

name: Evolve Lab

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, or 10
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: EvolveLabOnline is a roguelite autobattler, where each enemy was created by another player. Modify and improve your creatures' behaviour after each victory and be the first to reach depths, where no other has been before!
